scripts.build: echo to build the graph please follow the instructions in the README. This script is here to help orchestrate Turborepo.
scripts.build:docker: DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker build --build-arg PROFILE=dev --tag hash-graph --file docker/Dockerfile ../../
scripts.build:docker:offline: DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker build --build-arg PROFILE=dev --build-arg ENABLE_TYPE_FETCHER=no --tag hash-graph --file docker/Dockerfile ../../
scripts.build:docker:test: DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker build --build-arg PROFILE=dev --build-arg ENABLE_TEST_SERVER=yes --tag hash-graph --file docker/Dockerfile ../../
